description: An empty project schema that is inherited by all project types.
title: project

related_projects.description: A list of other projects that may be logically grouped with this one.

contributors.description: List of people contributing to any aspect of the project.
contributors.example: List of authors for a publication resulting from this project.

submitters.description: List of people submitting ultimately responsible for the project.
submitters.example: List of corresponding authors for a publication resulting from this project.

insdc_project.description: An INSDC (International Nucleotide Sequence Database Collaboration) project accession. Can be from the DDBJ, EMBL-EBI, or NCBI. Accession must start with DRP, ERP, or SRP.

supplementary_files.example: Experimental design documents, electronic notebook files, manuscripts in preparation, etc.

publications.description: A list of publications resulting from this project.

insdc_study.description: An INSDC (International Nucleotide Sequence Database Collaboration) study accession. Can be from the DDBJ, EMBL-EBI, or NCBI. Accession must start with PRJE, PRJN, or PRJD
